content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the municipal court split the case involved a coownership property dispute that was resolved through an extrajudicial procedure the procedure lasted for 1 year and 9 months and the final resolution was the dissolution of the coownership community and the sale of the property through a public auction the property in question is a specific apartment located on the first floor of a building the apartment has four rooms a kitchen dining room pantry bathroom toilet foyer hallway and loggia the dissolution of the joint ownership will be done through a civil division public auction sale and the proceeds will be distributed between the parties involved the proposer is entitled to 13 of the achieved value while the proposed is entitled to 23 of the achieved value the court has examined the documentation provided including the inheritance resolution and expert opinions and has determined that the plaintiff is entitled to their coownership share based on the inheritance the court suggests conducting a civil division procedure because the apartment cannot be divided into separate residential units the court accepts the experts report and addresses the objections raised by the parties the court will decide on the course of action based on the arguments and opinions presented the court accepted the expertise of an expert who provided a logical and reasoned opinion based on professional standards the court rejected the proposal for a new expert examination the court decided to sell the property through a public auction with the proceeds distributed proportionally among the coowners the division of the property will be carried out according to the rules of the enforcement act the court also addressed objections regarding investments in the property and payment obligations a separate proceeding will be conducted to resolve any potential claims related to the nonuse of the property finally the court will issue a decision regarding the civil division of the property based on the provisions of the law
